-JpmqvwtrKVl2BwJvQQQ.instructions: After completing each step of this tutorial, click the blue "Done" button in the instructions bar (at the top of the screen). Try it now!

-Jpmr-WVXbAlre6b08NG.instructions: Type "buy milk" in the input field, and press Enter to add a new todo item.

-Jpmr2d03RE5IdNvcJ8Y.instructions: Double-click on the todo item you added to show the details panel on the right.

-Jpmr5V5-W__6Fys9vvI.instructions: Write a more detailed description in the yellow area on the right: "for the cake"

-Jpmr8mOC3uPtDvAnuTO.instructions: Click on the star icon to mark it as important.

-JpmrBGvVPpLUUEoYtnR.instructions: In the left sidebar, there is an item called "Starred". This is an intelligent filter, that shows all the todos due in the coming week. Check that "call mom" appears there.

-JpmrDU6AXxZMYK7STJE.instructions: To create another todo, you need to go back to the Inbox. Click on "Inbox" in the left sidebar.

-JpmrFyEbe7EYlf-ze5y.instructions: Add a third todo item: "watch a good movie"

-JpmrJ9OeM2st2VY-sko.instructions: Double-click on this todo item, and change its due date to next Saturday.

-JpmrLJVfP2Q4C7xLmDs.instructions: Let's say you have bought the milk. Tick the checkbox to mark the corresponding todo item as complete.

-JpmrOC2CwBHNS0rJLKL.instructions: At the bottom of the list, there is a button "1 completed item". Click on it to reveal the todo you've just checked off.

-JpmrSc9FhsxP2fBL0CI.instructions: Delete the todo item "buy milk": double-click on it to open the details panel, then click the trash icon at the bottom.

-JpmrWRV3vcTwmrd_TET.instructions: To change the settings, click on "Ann Onymous " in the top left corner, and choose "Customize" in the menu.

-JpmrbctJh0t-KqtYxHA.instructions: You are now in Customization Mode. You can click on the highlighted items to see the settings associated with them.
